Your feedback is valuable to us to bring to you better resources in your quest to excel in career and life. Kindly help us to help you by giving us feedback.

Welcome to CL\'s PDP Zone, a smarter tool to explore yourself. Track your PIs, B-School forms, mentor feedback, previous year\'s B-School experiences of CL Alumni, knowledge sessions and much more as you aim to ace your stage 2 process of B-School admissions. Unfold the knowledge tree!
Still no joy? just drop us a line at help@aspiration.ai.

The first question in most interviews is "Tell me something about yourself". Answering this question is all about self-introspection. Take these tests given below to get a 360 degree understanding of your self.

I am Amicus. I know a lot about B-Schools and the different entrance exams. I can also play games with you. I have been trained to converse with you in a natural way. You can also click on the suggested action prompts
This chat bot has also been released for Amazon\'s Echo devices on the Alexa platform.

Algebra is one of the broad parts of mathematics, together with number theory, geometry and analysis.

An excellent track record, high quality education and the pick of the corporates is what matters.

CL's B-School Ranking To simplify your B-school selection we have categorized India's top B- schools into eight clusters. The list of B-school in India can go on forever, however, we have tried to limit our classification to the better and more known B-schools. 

Note, as you proceed from the best to the also-rans, the level of differentiation between both the schools and the clusters significantly diminishes. When reviewing B-schools within a cluster, the preference generally diminishes as you read further from top to bottom. For example, in Cluster 1, we feel that IIM-A is the best B-school in India at present, followed by Bangalore, Kolkata and so on. In certain clusters, the differentiation on the quality of the institute is specialization-driven, and the top to bottom reading is not necessarily representative.

Before taking final admission into any of these B-schools, please ensure that you speak to some students of the current batch and a few of their alumni and visit the websites of the institutes for detailed information. Apart from these premier institutes, there are several other colleges that offer an MBA degree - if you want more details, please write to us at support@careerlauncher.com
Individual account creation process for student
1. Register yourself as a student\n2. Aspiration account is activated as per your age\n3. You can add your parent or siblings and activate accounts for each person
Individual account creation process for parent
1. Register yourself as a parent\n2. Aspiration account is activated as per your age\n3. You can add your Children and Husband/Wife and activate acccunts for each person
If you see any discrepancy in the figures shown above. Please write to us on administrator@careerlauncher.com
Your account has been successfully created! Credentials are sent on your registed email-ID or phone number.

An exciting game for a family or a serious aspirant for a competitve exam. The game adjusts the difficulty level depending on your responses, making GK a fun activity all the time. The game offers 5 questions at a time. Each question has three options. A detailed explanation is offered at the end of each question so that you can genuinely learn from the questions. \n\nAt the end of the game, a final score and rank compared to over 10,000 other players is provided.

An exciting game for a family or a serious aspirant for a competitve exam. The game adjusts the difficulty level depending on your responses, making GK a fun activity all the time. The game offers 5 questions at a time. Each question has three options. A detailed explanation is offered at the end of each question so that you can genuinely learn from the questions. 

At the end of the game, a final score and rank compared to over 10,000 other players is provided. 

The questions vary in difficulty level and depending on the ability of the player the questions are made easier or more difficult. The questions have been selected to serve as a refresher of basic and advanced general knowledge. 

Basic GK covers topics like History ( Ancient India, Medieval India, British Rule, Important dates, Battles, National Days, etc. Geography covers basic facts. important countries, capitals and currencies, parliaments, Industries, etc 

The other major topics include the Constitution of India, Science, Sports,Sobriquets, Books and Authors, Economic facts, etc
